member.name: T:IniWrapper.Settings.MissingFileWhenLoadingHandling
member.summary: Handling situation when file is missing or FilePath is not set.

member.name: F:IniWrapper.Settings.MissingFileWhenLoadingHandling.ForceLoad
member.summary: Library will not check if file exists. It will always try to load from file.

member.name: F:IniWrapper.Settings.MissingFileWhenLoadingHandling.DoNotLoad
member.summary: If file is missing library will return instance of given configuration class. It won't neither write nor read anything from file.

member.name: F:IniWrapper.Settings.MissingFileWhenLoadingHandling.CreateWithDefaultValues
member.summary: If file is missing library will create instance of given configuration class save it to file and return instance. Note: FilePath has to be set.

member.name: F:IniWrapper.Settings.NullValueHandling.Ignore
member.summary: Null values will be not written

member.name: F:IniWrapper.Settings.NullValueHandling.ReplaceWithEmptyString
member.summary: Null values will be replaced with empty string, for complex types library will create instance of it and write it
